name: DVD Mode
description: Adds legendary DVD screensaver bouncing to GD popups

no-triggers.name: Exclude trigger popups
no-triggers.description: <cg>Don't affect trigger and some other editor popups</c>

only-small.name: Affect only small popups
only-small.description: <co>When enabled, mod affects only small popups (ones that occupy less than 1/4 of the screen area)</c>

heavy-popups.name: Heavy popups
heavy-popups.description: <cy>Makes bigger popups bounce slower while smaller popups faster</c>

anim-speed.name: Speed
anim-speed.description: <cl>The speed at which the popup is moving (apply settings and open a new popup to see the changes in speed)</c>

delay.name: Initial delay
delay.description: <cj>Time (in seconds) before the popup starts moving</c>
